remarks: The norm of a vector plus the imaginary scalar product of another. (Contributed by NM, 2-Feb-2007.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
nvdif.1 $e |- X = ( BaseSet ` U ) $.
nvdif.2 $e |- G = ( +v ` U ) $.
nvdif.4 $e |- S = ( .sOLD ` U ) $.
nvdif.6 $e |- N = ( normCV ` U ) $.
nvpi $p |- ( ( U e. NrmCVec /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( N ` ( A G ( _i S B ) ) ) = ( N ` ( B G ( -u _i S A ) ) ) ) $.
